data.text: This place is NEVER a 5*. The place is needing a complete deep clean, 2nd floor eatery is filthy, the public toilets in hotel and Grill bar are appalingy dirty and never any soap/toilet rolls. Food is repetitive and cold, out of 7 days ate out 5 night time meals. The only thing good about this place is the staff. They totally made this holiday, thanks Albert, Sammi etc from bars.
data.title: Never a 5*. Needs a complete makeover and deep clean.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for taking the time to post your thoughts and concerns about your recent stay at Naama Bay.  We greatly depend on our valuable guests' feedback and welcome every opportunity to improve. I was concerned to read that your stay did not live up to your expectations and I am sorry you were disappointed. I can advise you however, that your review will be used to consider possible improvements needed and we hope you might give us the chance to show you what we have done.

Best regards,
Hotel management
owner_response.author: Guest Relation

data.text: Very nice hotel. Food is very good. Animation team very activ, a a lot of activities during day, darts game, water polo my favourite. Night show every day different. Near the hotel a lot of cafe, night clubs. I recommend this hotel for everyone!!!!?
data.title: Very nice hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Many thanks for your review; we are delighted to read that you had a great time at Naama bay hotels. And we do look forward to welcoming you back soon. Please feel free to let us know once you have booked your next holiday; we will do everything we can to make your stay with us even more enjoyable.

Best regards,
Hotel management

data.text:
The staff are still as friendly as ever and Mahmood the pool gut at ympic pool work so hard, cleaning bed chairs, pool and surround every day
Food has gone down hill over past 7 visits. Food cold and very much in favour of the Russian visitors they now have. 
Restaurant manager did say that if nothing on menu we liked he would cook us something of our choice.  Very accommodating indeed x
data.title: Gone down hill

data.text:
I have a lovely time at mamma bay hotel the o my downside is the food if you are not looking to leave the hotel then I would say the food maybe an issue.

We booked trips to Cairo with your guides and a day trip with banderas and I cannot recommend him enough he had this all planned prior to us going and meet us at check to explain this all to us you must book with him in Sharm el sheikh his contact number +20 122 829 1309 thank you !!!!
data.title: Not quite 5* but banderas made up for it
